ygData.subject: Re: pets
ygData.msgSnippet: Pets, and monsters for that matter, in Feerrott wander off, and even get stuck in walls.  I just gave up on using a pet in Feerrott. ... From: erik lawrence
ygData.messageBody:
Pets, and monsters for that matter, in Feerrott wander off, and even get
stuck in walls. I just gave up on using a pet in Feerrott.

----- Original Message -----
From: erik lawrence antonsen <eantonse@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 2:40 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] pets


> From: erik lawrence antonsen <eantonse@...>
>
>
> Hey all,
>
> I finally got to level 10 and can now cast my first pet.
> unfortunately, it seems to wander off all the time. But only in the
> Feerot so far. It worked ok in Innothule swamp, but in the feerot, it
> seems to go berzerk. Anyway, Just wondering if anyone had this happen to
> them. What other zones does it happen in? Let me know f you have any
> info...Also curious, what are some of the pet commands. The only one that
> seemed to work was /pet sit down. I tried /pet attack, /pet kill, /pet
> follow me. Thanks,
>
> Oogog
> lev 10 Solusek Ro
>
> ************************************************************************
> Always remember to pillage BEFORE you burn.
> ************************************************************************
>
>
